title: What, if any, "natural/herbal" supplements actually work as claimed?
description: Answer (1 of 2): St. Johns Wort is a mild antidepressant. There is questionable efficacy of glucosamine and chondroitin. Some meta-analysis of a combination of studies says it is effective. Others show it no better than placebo though when used in severe arthritis in combination with other ap...
